ministry.name: Overhead Ministry
ministry.overview: This ministry works in conjunction with the Worship Team. We oversee the overhead projectors and lights for each service.

long-description.p: This ministry serves everyone who attends Calvary for each of the 3 Sunday services as well as the mid-week Wednesday service. Each member in this ministry runs the overhead projectors for their assigned service as well as controls the lighting in the auditroium and stage.
